protected  List<HierarchicalCluster<E>> WardClustering.clusters
          Stores the clusters; starts from being a list of clusters containing only one element (n elements), up to a final set of clusters; there will be at least one single cluster containing all elements (if the WardClustering.targetSize or WardClustering.threshold permit that), or potentially any other number m <= n.
